DataElement.preferredName: Measured Less Than or Equal 1.5 Times Upper Limit of Normal Activated Partial Thromboplastin Time (aPTT) Within Anticoagulant Agent Therapeutic Range Occurrence Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded indicator response regarding whether the result of the Activated Partial Thromboplastin Time (aPTT) is less than or equal to 1.5 times the institution upper limit of normal (ULN), unless the use of anticoagulant therapy requires a therapeutic range that must be observed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Measured Less Than or Equal 1.5 Times Upper Limit of Normal Activated Partial Thromboplastin Time (aPTT) Within Anticoagulant Agent Therapeutic Range Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Having been determined by measurement._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest is smaller than the other object in one of these ways._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::1.5_The top value of the range of statistical characteristics that are supposed to represent accepted standard, non-pathological pattern for particular laboratory result or other quantitative parameter._A measurement of the length of time that it takes for clotting to occur when reagents are added to a plasma specimen. The test is partial due to the absence of tissue factor (Factor III) from the reaction mixture._On the inside; contained in._Agents that prevent blood clotting. Naturally occurring agents in the blood are included only when they are used as drugs._Relating to or involved in therapy._The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Measured Less Than or Equal To Integer::1.5 Upper Limit of Normal Partial Thromboplastin Time
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Having been determined by measurement.:A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest is smaller than the other object in one of these ways.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::1.5:The top value of the range of statistical characteristics that are supposed to represent accepted standard, non-pathological pattern for particular laboratory result or other quantitative parameter.:This is a measurement of the intrinsic pathway of coagulation. Significant deficiency in factors II, V, VIII, IX, X, XI, XII or anticoagulants will prolong PTT. (BioTech Life Science Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest is smaller than the other object in one of these ways.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The top value of the range of statistical characteristics that are supposed to represent accepted standard, non-pathological pattern for particular laboratory result or other quantitative parameter.

A measurement of the length of time that it takes for clotting to occur when activating reagents are added to a plasma specimen. The test is partial due to the absence of tissue factor (Factor III) from the reaction mixture.

Property.preferredName: Within Anticoagulant Agent Therapeutic Range Occurrence
Property.preferredDefinition: On the inside; contained in.:Agents that prevent blood clotting. Naturally occurring agents in the blood are included only when they are used as drugs.:Relating to or involved in therapy.:The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: Any agent capable of preventing blood clot formation.
Relating to or involved in therapy.
The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is pre-study Activated Partia
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is pre-study Activated Partial Thromboplastin Time (aPTT)  less than or equal to 1.5 X ULN unless subject is receiving anticoagulant therapy not requiring laboratory monitoring as long as PT or PTT is within therapeutic range of intended use of anticoagulants?
